title: Domestos pledges to destroy germs and protect children (Australian Committee for UNICEF Ltd)
text: ( Source : Australian Committee for UNICEF Ltd) Every year, 1.7 million children don't live to celebrate their fifth birthday because of diarrhoea and pneumonia. But the simple act of handwashing with soap could cut these deaths by almost
